file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-71-01-04 - MAGNETIC SPEED PICK-UP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAGNETIC SPEED PICK-UP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the magnetic speed pick up. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-71-01-000-801-A MAGNETIC SPEED PICK UP - REMOVAL T-62T-40C11 AIRCRAFT WITH APU MAGNETIC SPEED PICK UP - INSTALLA- 49-71-01-400-801-A T-62T-40C11 TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-71-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-71-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. MAGNETIC SPEED PICK UP - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-71-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the APU magnetic speed pick up. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-71-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-71-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 3. MAGNETIC SPEED PICK UP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the APU magnetic speed pick up. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-71-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. (3) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-71-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
